Package main.body

Class GameManager

java.lang.Object
main.body.GameManager
public class GameManager extends Object
This class is used to create a game manager object. The GameManager is the main class of the game. This class acts as a facade for the GameManagerUI.

  • Constructor Summary

    This is the constructor for the GameManager class.

    • onMatchFinish

      public void onMatchFinish()
      This method is used when a match is finished or a bye is taken. It will increase the week by 1 and update the store and other teams. If the season is over, it will end the game.

    • getRarityInt

      public int getRarityInt()
      This method calculates the a number which represents the rarity of the players in the store and the opposing team.
      Returns:
      The rarity int for the game.
